inventory.commentary: NOTE: Object dedicated IS the person doing the dedicating.

sense.name: Give oneself entirely to a specific person, activity, or cause.
sense.examples: She devoted herself entirely to the Church. He devoted his whole self to the shelter.

sense.name: Allocate or dedicate; set aside or apart for a specific purpose or use.
sense.commentary: NOTE: Compare to Sense 1: in Sense 2, the object dedicated is not the AGENT. Syntax Is: NP1 [AGENT] DEVOTE NP2 (to NP3)
sense.examples: The land was devoted to mining. I devote a half hour each day to meditation. She devoted much thought to nursing but ended up becoming a teacher instead.
